    • switchScene

      public void switchScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String title) throws IOException
      on user action click button get corresponding different view
      Parameters:
      event - button to toggle between views
      title - text of button to toggle views
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the stage does not exist or error occurs loading new view author Avinash

      Parameters:
      scene - Page view which needs to be resized

    • getEmployeeID

      private Integer getEmployeeID(Connection conn, String username, String password)
      Retrieves the employee ID for the given login credentials from the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - active database connection
      username - employee's username
      password - employee's password
      Returns:
      employee_id or null if not found author Avinash
